item.title: Linux Nginx下运行jsp，jdk、tomcat配置
item.description: 一、前提条件 使用Xshell、Xftp 安装好JDK、Tomcat 二、配置环境 vim /etc/profile 输入以下内容： JAVA_HOME=/usr/local/java/jdk-14.0.1 CLASSPATH=$JAVA_HOME/lib/ PATH=$PATH:$JAVA_HOME/bin export PATH JAVA_HOME CLASSPATH CATALINA_BASE=/usr/local/tomcat CATALINA_HOME=/usr/local/tomcat export CLASSPATH=.:${CATALINA_HOME}/bin/tomcat-juli.jar:${CATALINA_HOME}/bin/bootstrap.jar export CATALINA_BASE CATALINA_HOME 进入/usr/local/tomcat/bin，输入./startup.sh启动tomcat 然后，ip:8080访问即可
